title: Who Am I
line1: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in building and developing high-performance, efficient web applications. I have worked on a variety of projects such as business applications, e-commerce, and e-learning platforms, which have given me a deep understanding of market needs and the ability to design innovative technological solutions that meet client expectations.
line2: I am proficient in a wide range of languages and technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and ExpressJS, with a continuous focus on improving performance and security. I also possess exceptional problem-solving skills and thrive in multicultural team environments.
line3: Although my experience in Android development is still in its early stages, I am constantly working to improve my skills in this area by working on small projects and utilizing the latest tools and technologies to develop innovative solutions.
